title: DIAT Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: Defence Institute of Advanced Technology (DIAT) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech., M.E/ M.Tech in Electrical Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, and Information Technology can grab this chance and apply for the DIAT Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and h...
